title: L’leech
desc:
Post 739
- Choose a player.
- They draw a [740] <:lime:1108048230542999633> Bug Repellent
- **Every turn, a random card of theirs turns <:red:1106234051129507932>.**
- **Each of their turns, they draw a card.**
- **All of their red cards are publicly revealed and everyone knows what they are.**
- This card is Destroyed if Bug Repellent is played.
